Item ID566

Soul runes are one of the runes used to cast spells in the Magic skill. It is used for the strongest curse spells, the teleport-other spells, Enchant Crossbow Bolt (Dragonstone), Blood Barrage, the shadow spells and most Reanimation spells.

Contents

  • 1 Runecraft info
  • 2 Spells requiring soul runes
  • 3 Products
  • 4 Item sources
    • 4.1 Store locations
  • 5 Changes
    • 5.1 Gallery (historical)

Runecraft info[edit | edit source]

With 100% Arceuus favour and 90 Runecraft, players can craft soul runes from dark essence fragments, granting 29.7 experience per fragment.

Requirements
SkillLevelXP
Runecraft90 (b)29.7
